summary: Website project for Vidhyapith Education (education consultancy) covering services from Graduation to PhD across all streams, with clear information and contact flow.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for “Vidhyapith Education” (education consultancy) that clearly presents offerings from Graduation to PhD across all streams, with navigation to core sections: Home, Services, Streams, About, and Contact.

Add a coherent visual theme and design system for the site (color palette, typography, spacing, component styling) with a distinct, professional education-consultancy look, applied consistently across all pages/sections (avoid blue & purple as the primary palette).

Implement website content sections that communicate: (1) what Vidhyapith Education does, (2) program levels supported (Graduation, Postgraduate, PhD), and (3) “All Streams” coverage, using clear headings, short descriptions, and structured lists/cards.
Add a Contact section/page that includes a form for prospective students to submit an inquiry (name, email or phone, interested level/program, stream/area of interest, message).
Wire the frontend Contact form submission to the backend inquiry method using the existing actor pattern, and handle success/error states in the UI.
Set appropriate basic site metadata for an education consultancy website (document title, description meta tag, and favicon) referencing “Vidhyapith Education”.
Add a simple footer with the business name “Vidhyapith Education” and a brief tagline (in English) aligned with education consultancy from Graduation to PhD.
Render the generated static images (logo and hero) from frontend static assets and integrate them into the UI (logo in header/footer; hero image in the top section).

Update the website’s top/hero messaging to clearly state that courses are available in Open/Distance mode and Online mode, and that these options are available across Chhattisgarh, using correct English spelling and grammar.

Revise the upper section design (header + home hero area) to a refreshed, more polished layout while keeping the existing navigation targets (Home/Services/Streams/About/Contact), responsiveness, and scroll-to-section behavior intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for Vidhyapith Education (education consultancy) presenting services for Graduation to PhD across all streams and enabling user contact
Add backend support to accept and persist contact inquiries submitted from the Contact form.
Update site copy to state courses are available in Open/Distance and Online modes, available across Chhattisgarh.
Revise the upper section design (top/hero/header area) per updated design preference.
